scripts.setup:usermanagement: npm run setup:cryptokey SYSTEMUSER_SESSIONKEY && npm run setup:cryptokey SYSTEMUSER_PASSWORDKEY && npx prisma generate --schema=./modules/userManagement/src/prisma/scheme.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./modules/userManagement/src/prisma/scheme.prisma && node modules/userManagement/src/setup.js
scripts.setup:tokenmanagement: npm run setup:cryptokey SYSTEMTOKEN_KEY && npx prisma generate --schema=./modules/tokenManagement/src/prisma/scheme.prisma && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./modules/tokenManagement/src/prisma/scheme.prisma && node modules/tokenManagement/src/setup.js
